actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to amend the Act of July 2, 1962, to authorize intrastate quarantines under extraordinary emergency conditions and to authorize U.S. Marshals to serve warrants under the Act.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to regulate the intrastate movement of animals, animal carcasses, products, and articles as the Secretary deems necessary to eradicate or prevent the dissemination of any disease which threatens the livestock or poultry of the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act of July 2, 1962, to authorize intrastate quarantines under extraordinary emergency conditions and to authorize U.S. Marshals to serve warrants under the Act.
